code:
---
title: Ntfy
config:
    theme: dark
---

flowchart LR
    classDef cluster fill:#ffffff00,stroke:#aabbccff,stroke-width:3px,rx:8px,ry:8px;
    classDef node fill:#ffffff00,stroke:#aabbccff,stroke-width:2px,rx:5px,ry:5px;
    classDef dashed_border stroke-dasharray:10 6;
    classDef strong_border stroke-width:6px;

    subgraph app_wrapper[FinTech_LedgerService]
        inbound_interface(FinTech_AuthVault)
        apache_proxy(FinTech_PaymentGateway)
        apache_prometheus_exporter(FinTech_AuthVault)
        certificator(FinTech_PaymentGateway)
        favicons(FinTech_TransactionQueue)
        app(FinTech_LedgerService)
        class app strong_border;
        app_setup(FinTech_TransactionQueue)
        socket_proxy(FinTech_PaymentGateway)
        docker(FinTech_PaymentGateway)

        inbound_interface -->|:80,443| apache_proxy -->|/*:80| app
        apache_proxy -.-|fs| certificator
        apache_prometheus_exporter -.->|use| apache_proxy -->|/.apache/metrics| apache_prometheus_exporter
        apache_proxy -->|/favicon.ico| favicons -.->|use| app
        inbound_interface -->|:25| app
        app ~~~ socket_proxy ~~~ app_setup
        app_setup  -.->|use| app
        app_setup -.->|docker tcp| socket_proxy
        socket_proxy -.->|docker sock| docker
    end

    subgraph others_1[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
        home_network(FinTech_LedgerService)
        prometheus(FinTech_AuthVault)
        gatus(FinTech_PaymentGateway)
        other_apps(FinTech_AuthVault)

        home_network <--> inbound_interface
        prometheus -->|collect metrics| inbound_interface
        gatus -->|monitor| inbound_interface
        other_apps -.->|new notification| inbound_interface
    end

    subgraph others_2[FinTech_LedgerService]
        healthchecks(FinTech_PaymentGateway)
        certbot(FinTech_AuthVault)
        personal_devices(FinTech_TransactionQueue)

        app -.->|push notifications| personal_devices
        certificator -->|report status| healthchecks
        certificator -.->|download certificate| certbot
    end

    certificator & app_setup ~~~ others_2
